long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With one click, you can export member information to a CSV file on a per channel basis. In fact, you can export multiple channels with one click as well.

Instructions

Log in with your Slack login.

Get a license via Gumroad and enter it in the extension popup.

Select the channel(s) that you'd like membership information to be exported.

Click on the Download CSV Button.
